Token.Abstract: Fired when server sent the streamId of the stream being published.

Parameter.Name: room
Parameter.Abstract: Instance of the room where event happen.

Parameter.Name: didPublishStreamId
Parameter.Abstract: String representing the Id of the stream being published.

Token.Abstract: Fired when server sent the recordingId of a stream being published and recorded.

Parameter.Name: room
Parameter.Abstract: Instance of the room where event happen.

Parameter.Name: streamId
Parameter.Abstract: String representing the Id of the stream being recorded.

Parameter.Name: recordingId
Parameter.Abstract: String representing the Id of the recording of the stream.
